tagline: This game will turn you upside down

oauth.invalid_state: Invalid CSRF state - possible security issue

fieldtype.password-choose: choose a secure password (min 8 chars, 1 uppercase, 1 special char)

errors.validation_error: Invalid format. Please check the submitted fields and try again.
errors.unauthorized: Authentication required. Please log in to access this resource.
errors.invalid_credentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email/username and password and try again.
errors.forbidden: Access denied. You do not have the necessary permissions for this action.
errors.not_found: Resource not found. Please verify the ID or URL and try again.
errors.conflict: This identifier already exists. Please use a unique identifier.
errors.rate_limit_exceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again in a few minutes
errors.mfa_required: Multi-factor authentication required. Please set up or enter your MFA code
errors.invalid_mfa_code: Invalid MFA code. Please check the code and try again
errors.invalid_2fa_code: Invalid 2FA code. Check your authenticator app and try again.
errors.login_session_expired: Login session expired. Please log in again.
errors.setup_session_expired: Setup session expired. Please restart the 2FA setup.
errors.too_many_attempts: Too many failed attempts. Please log in again.
errors.totp_already_enabled: 2FA is already enabled on this account.
errors.2fa_not_enabled: 2FA is not enabled on this account.
errors.internal_error: Internal server error. Please try again later.
errors.friend_self_add: You cannot add yourself as a friend

2fa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
2fa.subtitle: Enter your 6-digit authentication code
2fa.help_text: Open your authenticator app to get the code
2fa.forgot_help_text: If you no longer have access to your 2FA app, visit the FAQ for account recovery steps.

setup.title: Two-Factor Authentication Setup
setup.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account with two-factor authentication.
setup.disable_description: Disable two-factor authentication on your account.
setup.disable_warning: Warning: Disabling 2FA will make your account less secure.
setup.scan_instructions: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
setup.verify_code: Enter the 6-digit code from your app to activate

file_uploader.drag: Or drag and drop it here
